name: zigbee2mqtt
description: Zigbee2MQTT is a self-hosted bridge that connects Zigbee devices to MQTT, enabling integration with many home automation platforms. It runs as a service with a web dashboard for managing devices and networks.

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Add Zigbee devices to your network through a simple web interface without proprietary hubs

features.title: Mqtt Bridge
features.description: Expose Zigbee devices to MQTT topics for integration with Home Assistant, Node-RED, and other platforms

features.title: Device Management
features.description: Configure, rename, and remove devices with detailed information about capabilities and status

features.title: Network Visualization
features.description: View your Zigbee network topology with signal strength and routing information

features.title: Ota Updates
features.description: Update device firmware over-the-air directly through the interface when manufacturers release updates

features.title: Group Control
features.description: Create device groups to control multiple lights or switches simultaneously with one command

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Set up direct device-to-device communication for faster response times and offline operation

features.title: Extensive Compatibility
features.description: Support thousands of Zigbee devices from hundreds of manufacturers with regular updates
